features.text: When you run into a roadblock, you need assistance right away. Vuetify offers support in our massive community on Discord.
features.title: Vibrant Community

features.text: Be prepared for an armada of specialized components at your disposal. With over 80 in total, there is a solution for any situation.
features.title: Semantic Material Components

features.text: Vuetify supports the future of Vue tooling through its vue-cli-3 plugin. Get started with one command and start building your next great idea.
features.title: Ready-Made Project Scaffolding
